changeSet.createView: SELECT CASH_CHECK_LINE.ID AS ID, CASH_CHECK.ID AS CHECK_ID, CASH_CHECK.CHECK_DATE AS CHECK_DATE, CASH_CHECK.TELEGRAM_USER_ID AS TELEGRAM_USER_ID, CASH_CHECK.TOTAL_SUM AS CHECK_TOTAL_SUM, CASH_CHECK.CASH_SUM AS CASH_SUM, CASH_CHECK.ECASH_SUM AS ECASH_SUM, PRODUCT.ID AS PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, CASH_CHECK_LINE.PRICE AS PRICE, CASH_CHECK_LINE.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, CASH_CHECK_LINE.TOTAL_SUM AS LINE_TOTAL_SUM FROM CASH_CHECK JOIN CASH_CHECK_LINE on CASH_CHECK.ID = CASH_CHECK_LINE.CHECK_ID JOIN PRODUCT on CASH_CHECK_LINE.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCT.id
